response.overview: That’s right! The revolution will be televised. This is what you’ve been waiting for so long. Mother’s Milk has taken upon itself to bring you the future of skiboarding. All the world’s best riders showing you the real deal. This video is not for the faint of heart. MMVM will set the record straight once and for all. Be prepared for the movement that will change the ski industry…
response.title: Mother’s Milk Video Magazine, vol. 1
